New Records: Virat Kohli scored 122 runs off 61 balls, the highest individual score in the match.
India scored 212 runs in 20 overs, their highest total in the series.
Key Match Events: KL Rahul was dismissed for 62 runs, the first wicket of the innings.
Suryakumar Yadav scored a quickfire 6 runs off 2 balls before being dismissed.
Rishabh Pant scored 20 runs off 16 balls, contributing to India's total.
Pre-Game Insights: Afghanistan elected to bat first in the match.
The match was part of the Men's T20 Asia Cup 2022 season.
Post-Match Reflections: India secured a comprehensive win, moving to the top of the series standings.
Virat Kohli was named Player of the Match for his exceptional batting performance.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was the 11th in the series, with India and Afghanistan competing in the Super Four stage.
The match was played at the Dubai International Cricket Stadium.
Others: The match was a crucial encounter in the tournament, with significant implications for both teams' standings.
